prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a mysterious aura and floating features.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon inspired by ancient artifacts with a unique color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of both clay and cosmic energy.
Design a Pokemon resembling a mystical doll that has a playful yet enigmatic personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body and intricate patterns that hint at its psychic powers.
Give me a creature that blends elements of ancient history with modern design in its appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a guardian of the ruins, featuring a unique blend of colors.
